posts.post_content:
I'm offering four graded T205 Gold Border cards.

You are invited to buy 1, 2, 3 or 4 cards.

There are therefore 15 possible combinations of cards you may want.

Below you will find scans of the four cards.  Please note that Murray is a Fact 42 reverse for what it's worth.

After looking at the scans, decide which card(s) you want to purchase.

Below the scans are the prices for the 15 different combinations of cards.

Select the price that you think is correct for the combination you select.

All prices include shipping.  If you select the correct price for the cards you want, a discount of up to five dollars will be applied to your order.  The more cards you buy the larger the discount.

So starting with the scans

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10736/evans[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10741/kroh[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10745/murray[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10757/wilson[/IMG]

Now you have seen the scans.  Feel free to ask questions about the cards.
When you are ready to select a card or cards, look at the price list and select your price.  You will only get one try for the discounted price.  I will notify you by PM what your final price will be.  Please understand that an attempt to obtain the discount by picking a price is considered an order whether you get the discount or not.  What form of harsh punishment will be used if you back out has not yet been determined.

Here are the prices in whole dollars payable net to me.

82
39
121
40
123
76
159
74
38
84
119
49
86
72
111


I reserve the right to update the price grid if a sale of less than 4 cards occurs.
Frank - the Murray is a 25, not a 42.
